(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD walked)
      (S
        (VP (VB pass)
          (NP (DT this) (NN stall))))
      (NP (JJ several) (NNS times))
      (PP (IN before)
        (S
          (VP (VBG deciding)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP
                  (ADVP (RB actually))
                  (VB order)
                  (NP (NN something))
                  (PP (IN from)
                    (NP (PRP them))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(walked-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, walked-2)
ccomp(walked-2, pass-3)
det(stall-5, this-4)
dobj(pass-3, stall-5)
amod(times-7, several-6)
dobj(walked-2, times-7)
prep(walked-2, before-8)
pcomp(before-8, deciding-9)
aux(order-12, to-10)
advmod(order-12, actually-11)
xcomp(deciding-9, order-12)
dobj(order-12, something-13)
prep(order-12, from-14)
pobj(from-14, them-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN thing))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT that))
        (S
          (VP (VBD attracted)
            (NP (PRP me))
            (PP (TO to)
              (NP (DT the) (NN stall)))))))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN sense))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NN nostalgia)))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NN stall))
      (VP (VBD looked)
        (SBAR (IN like)
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (VBD had)
              (VP (VBN been)
                (ADVP (RB around))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (ADVP (RB awhile)))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT any) (NN stall))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ has)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN signboard))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT that))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBZ is)
                      (VP (VBN handpainted))))))))))
      (VP (MD must)
        (VP (VB have)
          (NP
            (NP (NN something))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT that))
              (S
                (VP (VBZ has)
                  (VP (VBN been)
                    (VP (VBG keeping)
                      (NP (PRP it))
                      (PP (IN around)
                        (NP (PDT all) (DT this) (NN time) (NN right))))))))))))
    (. ?)))

      (SBAR (IN that)

          (NP (PRP they))

              (VP (TO to)

                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB do)
                        (NP (NN everything))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB just))

      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN nostalgia))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN place))
            (CC and)

          (NP (PRP you))

                  (QP (CC and)
                    (RB just))))

pobj(in-16, just-18)
prep(drop-15, about-19)
nn(something-21, order-20)
pobj(about-19, something-21)
prep(something-21, for-22)
pobj(for-22, everyone-23)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ My) (NN son))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB have)
        (VP (VBN loved)
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Tim) (NNP Sum)))))
    (, ,)))


poss(son-2, My-1)
nsubj(loved-5, son-2)
aux(loved-5, would-3)
aux(loved-5, have-4)
root(ROOT-0, loved-5)
det(Sum-8, the-6)
nn(Sum-8, Tim-7)
dobj(loved-5, Sum-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (SBAR (IN while)
      (S
        (NP
          (NP (PRP me))
          (CC and)
          (NP (PRP$ my) (NN wife)))
        (VP (MD would)
          (VP (VB go)
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Cze) (NNP Char))
                (CC and)
                (NP (PRP$ my) (NN mother-in-law))))))))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB have)
        (VP (VBN gone)
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (NNP Roast) (NNP Duck))))))
    (. .)))


mark(go-7, while-1)
nsubj(go-7, me-2)
cc(me-2, and-3)
poss(wife-5, my-4)
conj(me-2, wife-5)
aux(go-7, would-6)
csubj(gone-17, go-7)
prep(go-7, for-8)
det(Char-11, the-9)
nn(Char-11, Cze-10)
pobj(for-8, Char-11)
cc(Char-11, and-12)
poss(mother-in-law-14, my-13)
conj(Char-11, mother-in-law-14)
aux(gone-17, would-15)
aux(gone-17, have-16)
root(ROOT-0, gone-17)
prep(gone-17, for-18)
nn(Duck-20, Roast-19)
pobj(for-18, Duck-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBG Judging)
      (PP (IN from)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN standard))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP HKM))))
        (, ,)))))


root(ROOT-0, Judging-1)
prep(Judging-1, from-2)
det(standard-4, the-3)
pobj(from-2, standard-4)
prep(standard-4, of-5)
det(HKM-7, the-6)
pobj(of-5, HKM-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT the) (NNP Cze) (NNP Char))
    (VP (MD could)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP
          (ADVP (RB somewhere))
          (JJ convenient)
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (DT a) (NN nightcap))))
        (SBAR
          (ADVP (DT every) (RB now)
            (CC and)
            (RB again))
          (IN if)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP live)
              (PP (IN around)
                (NP (DT the) (NN area))))))))
    (. .)))


det(Char-3, the-1)
nn(Char-3, Cze-2)
nsubj(convenient-7, Char-3)
aux(convenient-7, could-4)
cop(convenient-7, be-5)
advmod(convenient-7, somewhere-6)
root(ROOT-0, convenient-7)
prep(convenient-7, for-8)
det(nightcap-10, a-9)
pobj(for-8, nightcap-10)
dep(now-12, every-11)
advmod(live-17, now-12)
cc(now-12, and-13)
conj(now-12, again-14)
mark(live-17, if-15)
nsubj(live-17, you-16)
advcl(convenient-7, live-17)
prep(live-17, around-18)
det(area-20, the-19)
pobj(around-18, area-20)
